params._goalAmount: The goal amount of funds desired.
params._projectWallet: The address of the fund seeker.

params._allowedTokens: The addresses of the Allowed Tokens.
params._funding: The address of the Funding contract.

returns._0: address        The Address of the fundseeker/s.
returns._1: goalAmount     The Goal Amount of the project.
returns._3: deadline       The Deadline of the project.

params._amount: The amount which is being funded.
params._token: The token which is being funded.

addProject(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Adds a project to this contract.

currentProjectDetails().notice: Returns information stored in struct of the project.

extendDeadline(uint256).notice: Allows updation of Deadline of the project.

forceReleaseFunds().notice: Force Transfers funds from this contract to the fundseekers.

fundsAccumulation(address,address,uint25.notice: Transfers funds from user through the funding contract.

updateGoals(uint256).notice: Allows updation of Goal Amount of the project.
